definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Bacterial mats or biofilms have never been found in the Dead Sea before.
sentences.chinese: 这些细菌和生物膜以前从未在死海被发现过。

sentences.english: Despite its name, the Dead Sea does harbour life.
sentences.chinese: 尽管名字有个“死”字，死海中却的确有生命。

sentences.english: The Dead Sea owes its high mineral salt content to several factors.
sentences.chinese: 死海矿物盐含量之高，原因有以下几点。

sentences.english: More than 2,500 sinkholes now line the shores of the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 在死海沿岸已经有超过2500个陷坑。

sentences.english: The Dead Sea lost thirty-three percent of its surface area during the last half -century.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的五十年中死海失去了百分之三十三的表面积。

sentences.english: Look at how the Dead Sea Scrolls were scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 回想一下吧，死海羊皮卷是如何被深入考究的。

sentences.english: They come from all over the world to be slathered in mineral-rich mud from the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们来自世界各地只为了涂抹死海富含矿物质的淤泥。

sentences.english: More than 2, 500 sinkholes now line the shores of the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 在死海沿岸已经有超过2500个陷坑。

sentences.english: This explains what makes the Dead Sea so salty.
sentences.chinese: 这就说清了是什么使死海的水如此的咸。

sentences.english: An ancient country of Palestine between the Dead Sea and the Gulf of Aqaba .
sentences.chinese: 巴勒斯坦的一个古国，位于死海与亚喀巴湾之间。

sentences.english: The area around the Sea is basically semi-desert.
sentences.chinese: 死海周边地区实际上是半沙漠化的。

sentences.english: There is also the Dead Sea, and Aqaba , where we have an incredible Coral Reef!
sentences.chinese: 还有死海，还有亚喀巴港，那里有不可思议的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: People can float easily on the Dead Sea because it is salty.
sentences.chinese: 人能很容易在死海浮起来因为它很咸。

sentences.english: Cleopatra and king herod floated in these waters.
sentences.chinese: 克丽奥佩特拉与希律王都曾在死海的海水中漂浮过。

sentences.english: Our Earth also has high-salinity waters, such as the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 地球上也有高盐度的水域，比如死海。

sentences.english: These are freshwater springs, jetting into the bottom of the Dead Sea from inside craters.
sentences.chinese: 那是淡水的泉水，从内部凹坑中涌入死海底部。
